words.tran_cn: 纠正；改正（correct的过去分词）；制止

trans.tran_cn: 正确的，恰当的，符合公认准则的，得体的
改正，纠正，批改，修改，指出错误
trans.tran_en: to show someone that something is wrong, and make it right
to make something right or to make it work the way it should
